inclusion.criterion: chronic pelvic pain defined as pelvic pain with a duration of six months of at least a moderate severity
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: not menstruating for reasons other than birth control
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: not currently receiving any current trauma-focused psychological treatment (i.e., prolonged exposure therapy, cognitive processing therapy, eye movement desensitization reprocessing)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: no current psychotic symptoms or current use of anti-psychotic medications
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: no current suicidal ideation in the past month
exclusion.label: met

notes: 16-year-old girl with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She has symptoms despite treatment.
